original: 三兄弟追擊呂布，然而赤兔馬神速無比，董卓兵馬也前來營救，三人只得放棄。八路諸侯聯軍宣告此戰獲勝，為得勝慶賀。
text: The three brothers chased Lü Bu, but the red rabbit horse was extremely fast, and Dong Zhuo also came to rescue him, and the three had to give up. The Allied Forces of the Eighth Route princes declared their victory in this battle and celebrated the victory.
